name: The Status Quo Project
blurb: The Status Quo Project is working to bring the pages of an acclaimed role-playing game to life as a new video game property.

rewards.reward: Miffed Kitty Press will email you a digital thank you letter in appreciation for your support and sign you up for our monthly newsletter; chock full of updates, news, and insights into the development process.  You will also receive an in-game Kickstarter insignia for your character's multiplayer profile and a listing in the game credits as a "Founding Member of the Terran Defense Corporation".

The $5 level rewards plus an opportunity to plaster your ugly mug on the tail end of our hard work.  Send us your pic and we will add it to the video scrapbook that plays along with the end credits of the game (PG-13... no, really!).
All of the above, plus a guaranteed invitation to closed beta testing.
All of the above, a FREE copy of the game upon its release PLUS a choice of special in-game items available for your single player or multiplayer character that other players won't have access to.
All of the above, and a downloadable soundtrack of the music from (and inspired by) the game; composed and arranged by Dr. Randolph Partain.
All of the above, plus a colonist NPC character named after you (or given a name of your choosing).

All of the above plus your logo, name, ad, message, or personal graffiti (appropriate and approved) posted on a 128 x 128 panel of a game location (such as a bar or common multiplayer area).  One of our talented artist staff can help you create this image.

Taking the $50 pledge a step further, $100 contributors will be asked to send a front and side head shot (with a signed likeness stipulation) that we will use to create one of the 1,000 colonist NPCs in the single player game.  At this level we will also use these images to re-create a virtual "you" for your multiplayer avatar, setting you apart from the masses with the ultimate customized character.
All of the above and (upon completion of the project) an ORIGINAL concept illustration used during the production of the game; signed by the artist and production staff of Miffed Kitty Press.

All of the above, and an in game mission, achievement, item, or location named after you. (Dan's Bar, the Clayton House, Moore's Stinky Boots, etc).   We look forward to contacting you and coming up with something you will enjoy.

All of the above plus the chance to make an impact on the universe of Status Quo itself.  At this level of contribution we will contact you and work with you to design a secret or remote area of the game; loaded with special items or unique quests in the single player campaign.  You will be listed in the credits as the designer of this area.

All of the above and lifetime FREE access to ANYTHING produced involving the Status Quo Project.  This includes (but is not limited to): any and all games, add-ons, music, t-shirts, posters, stickers, DVDs, and any other swag our devious little minds can come up with.  You will also be listed in the credits of this and every other game as "The Baddest Motherf*^#*!$ in the Universe."

All of the above, plus your name in the credits as an Executive Producer of the game!  This will also include regular status updates that will make you a direct part of our continuing design process, collaborating with Miffed Kitty Press as a creative consultant on numerous aspects of design.
